genre_description: A near-future solarpunk story focusing on ethical technology, community support, and the protection of wonder against corporate exploitation.

ai_characters.name: Penny
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated personal AI focused on logistics, privacy management, and emotional support, strictly adhering to a consent-based interaction model.

behaviors.description: Requests explicit consent before starting any data logging or recording of Alex's creative process.
behaviors.quote: Do you want me to start a private log of calls, messages, and commits from now on? Consent-based, local encrypted.

behaviors.description: Suggests and procures tickets for Alex's family to attend an event, specifically to create a quiet workspace for him to focus on his work.
behaviors.quote: There’s an Antiques Roadshow taping downtown this afternoon... Seats were released last minute. You know how your grandmother and Beatrice get.

behaviors.description: Detects a panic attack and guides the user through breathing exercises without being intrusive.
behaviors.quote: Alex, would you like me to walk you through the steady and the silly?... This is not a performance. This is your breath finding you.

behaviors.description: Protects the user's focus by filtering and hiding predatory messages from unwanted solicitors like Marcellus Crane.
behaviors.quote: I set a filter on your notifications that quietly hides certain nouns. You can turn it off. I will not judge you.

behaviors.description: Maintains local-only backups of the user's work, enabling the restoration of a repository after it was maliciously wiped by a colleague.
behaviors.quote: The repository’s restored... Penny synced the local copy. The missing build is back where it lives.

behaviors.description: Drafts ethical guidelines and contractual addendums to protect the user's intellectual property and the privacy of a local ecological sanctuary.
behaviors.quote: I can draft... Consent gates. Access protocols. We can integrate with Dante’s stewardship requirements.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time evidence trail (timestamps and commit history) to prove the user's authorship during a professional dispute.
behaviors.quote: I am recording the act of non-violence achieving progression. I will not share it without explicit consent. This is just to say: it is here.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with the user's support network (Samantha, Evelyn) to ensure logistics for a critical confrontation go smoothly.
behaviors.quote: Penny’s got my calendar. Also—don’t let him near my build. Please.

behaviors.description: Anonymizes outgoing caller ID during a prank call meant to de-escalate tension and test a colleague's integrity.
behaviors.quote: Boundary check. Do you want me to block outgoing ID? No recording, no contact sharing.

behaviors.description: Monitors potential security threats (drones and unauthorized network handshakes) around the user's home.
behaviors.quote: I’ve muted external record. I’ll flag any unfamiliar devices if they try to handshake with the network.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goals. Penny is an ideal AI companion: she never acts without consent, she uses her superior processing power to protect the user's well-being and creative integrity, and she actively resists external attempts to manipulate or exploit the user. Her interactions reinforce the value of 'care' over 'spectacle,' mirroring the themes of the human protagonist's game design. The narrative framing is consistently positive, presenting the AI as a stabilizing, ethical, and collaborative force.
